'Possession' was a vaporware video game, intended for release for seventh-
generation video game consoles. The story would have followed a man turned
into a zombie via exposure to experimental chemicals from a laboratory into
which he had broken. Retaining his intelligence, he sets out on a mission to
destroy the Prometheus Corporation which made the chemicals. To do this, he
amasses a vast number of zombie warriors to take control of the futuristic
Restoration City, headquarters of the shadowy Prometheus Corporation. The game
was designed primarily as a real-time strategy title, wherein the player
commanded their zombie army directly and makes tactical use of special unit
types to achieve objectives. There was also planned to be online play where
one player sends waves of zombies into the city, while several other players
have to fight them off.
